title: Tank meta making game less fun
body: Does any one else feel like this tank meta is really starting to get boring? i feel like it doesnt even take skill to climb ranks anymore just picking tanky damage doers and you basically get freelo... ofc i understand every champ needs skill but i reckon this meta is extremely BORING

This meta is just ridiculously boring, tanks are too powerful and shouldn't be able to 1v1 an adc and walk out with more than half health and tanks shouldn't be able to do the amount of damage they do now. Tanks being able to do 50k damage while taking 65k and dying 2 times should not happen. That's pretty much Garen in a nutshell, I know the term broken gets tossed around a ton today but I think (my opinion you don't have to agree) Garen is legit broken. The fact that he can build 2 items (Warmogs and SV) and have nearly 150+ health regen is broken, because at the same time he can build no damage items and still do a ridiculous amount of damage. Seriously, if you build SV, Warmogs, Sunfire, Banshees, Tabi's, and a Thornmail you will die maybe 2 times the entire game. This combined with the fact that Garen is braindead easy to play is just ridiculous, with that build he can deal almost 20k damage of ap and ad for a total of around 40k damage to champs, **HOW IS THAT FAIR**.  He becomes pretty much unkillable and can kill pretty much anything if that isn't broken I don't know what is. He's not the only champ that's like that either, Amumu, Sej, Gragas, Cho'Gath and many more can do the same thing. The tank meta has made the game extremely boring for me.

Refer to my post (about building and encouraging the building of Liandry's and Blade of the Ruined King) (< This is the problem I see with the tank meta - people not countering it or not taking execute type Champions etc to deal with a plethora of tank picks on the other team).

I don't know who says tanks take no skill - I think they take skill (Mundo for Example). They take good timing, often take a lot of skill and get punished for mistakes if they are versing able enemies, often they don't have good disengage (good enough for how deep they often are in teamfights) and it's easy to fail at tanking - if anyone takes less skill - it's carries because they are very straight forward and while they take a lot of positioning - if you don't know what you are doing you will lose - but while a tank benefits from taking hits in a lot of cases, being able to maximise their skillset, time engages, retreat at the right time, bait and also be landing autos and timing rundowns to keep in range for skills - or positioning is important - making them quite skill-requiring.

I hate that a lot of the burstiness of the game has been removed but a lot of the more powerful tanking items have been removed so tanks now aren't the brick walls late game they used to be so if anything I think it's less of a tank meta at the moment and more of a bruiser/sustained damage meta and as such countering this with your own sustained damage (maybe taking defense as an ADC or taking some %HP dmg or %hp damage champions is a good idea to deal with what might be a lot of sejaunis, Gragas's, Garens, Mundo's, Trundles and Maokai's being picked and played).

Bear in mind the new jungle made life easier for a lot of these champs and has made it harder for more AD or burst Based junglers so remember to pick Champions that can deal with tanky junglers etc or consider itemising against them and I don't think you'll have a problem - let alone be bored.
